name: Smash
author: R​iceKirby
summary: [IMPORTANT: This is an experimental version being tested, completely different from the normal SSBB] An epic battle between the franchises that take part in the Super Smash Bros. universe. Can you beat all the other teams to show your franchise is the superior one?

nokiller.msg: ±Info: ~Self~ is not a Daykiller, Nightkiller or Poisoner!

system_death.singleconvertmsg: ~Self~'s death has made the rest of the System characters stronger!

dayprotect.dummyusermsg: You made ~Target~ immune to standby actions for this turn!
dayprotect.dummytargetmsg: You are immune to standby actions for this turn!

copy_vote.msg: You can use /copy [name] to have twice the votes of your target!
copy_vote.exposemsg: 'You can't run from Star Wolf! I will always have twice the power you have!'

roles.startupmsg: You are ~Role~, a plumber, jumpman and Nintendo's most famous mascot!
roles.help: You can kill a player at night with /kill [name] (shared with your team). You can also kill a player during the day with /kill [name], but that will have a 30% chance of revealing you.
roles.info: Can kill (shared). Can daykill (30% chance of revealing). ~Sided~

kill.msg: You can kill a player now with /kill [name] (you have a 30% chance of being revealed).
kill.killmsg: Mario throws a giant fire ball at ~Target~, who gets enveloped by the intense flames!
kill.revealmsg: ~Self~'s flaming eyes are the proof of Mario's excitement for this explosive attack!

roles.help: DONTDO

roles.startupmsg: You are ~Role~, the virus-fighting doctor!
roles.help: You can kill a player at night with /kill [name] (shared with your team) and cure a poisoned player every 3 turns with /cure [name]. You also get hax on poison.
roles.info: Can kill (shared). Can cure poison every 3 turns. Hax on Poison. ~Sided~

roles.startupmsg: You are ~Role~, Mario's green brother and the eternal understudy!
roles.help: You can kill a player at night with /kill [name] (shared with your team). You can also use /inspect [name] at night to find if your target can daykill, kill or poison. You also get hax on night and daykills.
roles.info: Can kill (shared). Can inspect (finds if target can daykill, kill or poison). Gets hax on Kills and Daykills. ~Sided~

roles.startupmsg: You are ~Role~, the princess of the Mushroom Kingdom!
roles.help: You can kill a player at night with /kill [name] (shared with your team). You can also expose someone's role during the day with /expose [name] (you won't be revealed).
roles.info: Can kill (shared). Can expose (not-revealed). ~Sided~

expose.msg: You can use /expose [name] to reveal someone's role (you won't be revealed).
expose.exposemsg: A Princess Peach-themed border covers the whole screen and a rain of peaches falls, pulling ~Target~, the ~Role~ into a deep slumber.

roles.startupmsg: You are ~Role~, the friendly dinosaur who's always helping Mario!
roles.help: You can kill a player at night with /kill [name] (shared with your team). You can also if someone visited another player or was visited themselves during the night with /follow [name].
roles.info: Can kill (shared). Can follow (Stalk + Watch). ~Sided~

roles.startupmsg: You are ~Role~, the keeper of the Comet Observatory!
roles.help: You can kill a player at night with /kill [name] (shared with your team). You can also find someone's role with /inspect [name].
roles.info: Can kill (shared). Can inspect. ~Sided~

roles.startupmsg: You are ~Role~, the King of Koopas and Mario's eternal rival!
roles.help: You can kill a player at night with /kill [name] (shared with your team). You also double the votes received by whoever you vote on.
roles.info: Can kill (shared). Doubles votes on voted person. ~Sided~

roles.startupmsg: You are ~Role~, Bowser's son and the Prince of Koopas!
roles.help: You can kill a player at night with /kill [name] (shared with your team). When you vote someone, the votes received by them will be halved. If lynched, you get one last kill before dying.
roles.info: Can kill (shared). Halves votes on voted person. Vengeful. ~Sided~

lynch.convertmsg: 'I still have a small trick up my sleeve!' - says Bowser Jr., who gets a last kill before dying from the lynch.

roles.startupmsg: You are ~Role~, but you just got lynched!
roles.help: You will die at the end of the night, but before that you still can kill two targets with /kill [name] (shared with your team) and /kill2 [name].

distract.msg: It seems the ~Distracter~ tried to distract someone who was already lynched. It was clearly not effective.

poison.poisonDeadMessage: You have been lynched during the day, but only died now!

roles.startupmsg: You are ~Role~, Mario's self-styled rival and chairman of WarioWare Inc.!
roles.help: You can kill a player at night with /kill [name] (shared with your team). Every 2 nights, you can use /kidnap [name] to make your target unable to use actions and have 0 votes for 1 turn.
roles.info: Can kill (shared). Can kidnap every 2 turns (turns someone into a role with no abilities and 0 votes for one turn). ~Sided~

roles.help: DONTDO

roles.startupmsg: You are ~Role~, the eletric mouse Pokémon!
roles.help: You can poison a player at night with /poison [name] (shared with your team). You can also kill a player every 2 nights with /kill [name], and if somehow they survive, they will end up poisoned!
roles.info: Can poison (shared). Can kill every 2 nights (poison if target survives). ~Sided~

roles.help: DONTDO

roles.startupmsg: You are ~Role~, the eletric mouse Pokémon!
roles.help: You can poison a player at night with /poison [name] (shared with your team). You can also kill a player every 2 nights with /kill [name], and if somehow they survive, they will end up poisoned!

roles.startupmsg: You are ~Role~, the eletric mouse Pokémon!
roles.help: You can poison a player at night with /poison [name] (shared with your team). You can also kill a player every 2 nights with /kill [name], and if somehow they survive, that fact will be exposed!
roles.info: Can poison (shared). Can kill every 2 nights (expose if target survives). ~Sided~

kill.dummybroadcastmsg: Pichu used Thunder! But ~Target~ somehow survived!

roles.startupmsg: You are ~Role~, the eletric mouse Pokémon!
roles.help: You can poison a player at night with /poison [name] (shared with your team). You can also kill a player every 2 nights with /kill [name], and if somehow they survive, that fact will be exposed!

kill.dummybroadcastmsg: Pichu used Thunder! But ~Target~ somehow survived!

roles.startupmsg: You are ~Role~, the balloon Pokémon!
roles.help: You can poison a player at night with /poison [name] (shared with your team). You can also distract a player with /distract [name]!
roles.info: Can poison (shared). Can distract. ~Sided~

roles.startupmsg: You are ~Role~, the balloon Pokémon!
roles.help: You can poison a player at night with /poison [name] (shared with your team). You can also distract a player with /distract [name]!

roles.startupmsg: You are ~Role~, the aura Pokémon!
roles.help: You can poison a player at night with /poison [name] (shared with your team). You can also protect and safeguard a player /protect [name]!
roles.info: Can poison (shared). Can protect (which also Safeguards). ~Sided~

roles.startupmsg: You are ~Role~, the aura Pokémon!
roles.help: You can poison a player at night with /poison [name] (shared with your team). You can also protect and safeguard a player /protect [name]!

roles.startupmsg: You are ~Role~, the ninja Pokémon!
roles.help: You can poison a player at night with /poison [name] (shared with your team). You can also make an ally immune to lynch for 1 turn with /sub [name].
roles.info: Can poison (shared). Can substitute (makes an ally immune to lynch for 1 turn). ~Sided~

sub.cursemsg: Your target (~Target~) will be immune to lynch for this turn!
sub.dummy2targetmsg: You are immune to lynch during this turn due to Greninja's Substitute!

roles.startupmsg: You are ~Role~, the ninja Pokémon!
roles.help: You can poison a player at night with /poison [name] (shared with your team). You can also make an ally immune to lynch for 1 turn with /sub [name].

sub.cursemsg: Your target (~Target~) will be immune to lynch for this turn!
sub.dummy2targetmsg: You are immune to lynch during this turn due to Greninja's Substitute!

roles.startupmsg: You are ~Role~, the genetic Pokémon!
roles.help: You can poison a player at night with /poison [name] (shared with your team). You can also find someone's side with /inspect [name]. Your vote counts as +2.
roles.info: Can poison (shared). Can inspect side. Vote counts as 2. ~Sided~

roles.startupmsg: You are ~Role~, the genetic Pokémon!
roles.help: You can poison a player at night with /poison [name] (shared with your team). You can also find someone's side with /inspect [name]. Your vote counts as +2.
DONTDO

roles.startupmsg: You are ~Role~, a trainer with 3 pokémon (Squirtle, Ivysaur and Charizard)!
roles.help: You can poison a player at night with /poison [name] (shared with your team). As you are currently using Squirtle, you can use /protect to protect yourself. You can change to Ivysaur with /change.
roles.info: Can poison (shared). Can self-protect. Can change into Pokémon Trainer (Ivysaur). ~Sided~

change.convertmsg: The Pokémon Trainer has called Squirtle back and sent out Ivysaur!

roles.startupmsg: You are ~Role~, a trainer with 3 pokémon (Squirtle, Ivysaur and Charizard)!
roles.help: You can poison a player at night with /poison [name] (shared with your team). As you are currently using Squirtle, you can use /protect to protect yourself. You can change to Ivysaur with /change.

change.convertmsg: The Pokémon Trainer has called Squirtle back and sent out Ivysaur!

roles.startupmsg: You are ~Role~, a trainer with 3 pokémon (Squirtle, Ivysaur and Charizard)!
roles.help: You can poison a player at night with /poison [name] (shared with your team). As you are currently using Ivysaur, you can use /distract [name] to prevent someone from acting. You can change to Charizard with /change.
roles.info: Can poison (shared). Can distract. Can change into Pokémon Trainer (Charizard). ~Sided~

change.convertmsg: The Pokémon Trainer has called Ivysaur back and sent out Charizard!

roles.startupmsg: You are ~Role~, a trainer with 3 pokémon (Squirtle, Ivysaur and Charizard)!
roles.help: You can poison a player at night with /poison [name] (shared with your team). As you are currently using Ivysaur, you can use /distract [name] to prevent someone from acting. You can change to Charizard with /change.

change.convertmsg: The Pokémon Trainer has called Ivysaur back and sent out Charizard!

roles.startupmsg: You are ~Role~, a trainer with 3 pokémon (Squirtle, Ivysaur and Charizard)!
roles.help: You can poison a player at night with /poison [name] (shared with your team). As you are currently using Charizard, you can use /kill [name] during the day to defeat an opponent, but that will reveal you! You can change to Squirtle with /change.
roles.info: Can poison (shared). Can Daykill (revealed). Can change into Pokémon Trainer (Squirtle). ~Sided~

change.convertmsg: The Pokémon Trainer has called Charizard back and sent out Squirtle!

kill.msg: You can kill someone now with /kill [name], but that will reveal you.
kill.killmsg: ~Self~ (Charizard) used Fire Blast! ~Target~ was burned by its flames!

roles.startupmsg: You are ~Role~, a trainer with 3 pokémon (Squirtle, Ivysaur and Charizard)!
roles.help: You can poison a player at night with /poison [name] (shared with your team). As you are currently using Charizard, you can use /kill [name] during the day to defeat an opponent, but that will reveal you! You can change to Squirtle with /change.

change.convertmsg: The Pokémon Trainer has called Charizard back and sent out Squirtle!

kill.msg: You can kill someone now with /kill [name], but that will reveal you.
kill.killmsg: ~Self~ (Charizard) used Fire Blast! ~Target~ was burned by its flames!

roles.startupmsg: You have been kidnapped!
roles.help: You are unable to use any action and even your vote counts as 0 now, but you will return to your normal role after 1 turn.
roles.info: A player kidnapped by Wario has no actions and their vote counts as 0. Turns back to original role after 1 turn.

roles.startupmsg: You are ~Role~, the Hero of Time!
roles.help: You can kill one person during the day with /kill [name], but that will reveal you! But at least you are immune to lynch.
roles.info: Can daykill (revealed). Immune to Lynch. ~Sided~

kill.msg: You can kill someone now with /kill [name], but that will reveal you.
kill.killmsg: ~Self~ raises the Master Sword into the air, followed by a few quick slashes to kill ~Target~!

lynch.convertmsg: As Link was about to be lynched, he used the Song of Time go back in time and escape it!

roles.startupmsg: You are ~Role~, the Hero of Time!
roles.help: You can kill one person during the day with /kill [name], but that will reveal you! But at least you are immune to lynch.

kill.msg: You can kill someone now with /kill [name], but that will reveal you.
kill.killmsg: ~Self~ raises the Master Sword into the air, followed by a few quick slashes to kill ~Target~!

lynch.convertmsg: As Link was about to be lynched, he used the Song of Time go back in time and escape it!

roles.startupmsg: You are ~Role~, the princess of Hyrule!
roles.help: You can expose someone's side during the day with /expose [name] (you won't be revealed). Your vote counts as +3 and you have a 50% chance of evading daykills. You can also use /transform during the day to change into Sheik.
roles.info: Can expose side (not revealed). 50% chance of evading daykills. Vote counts as +3. Can transform into Sheik during the day. ~Sided~

expose.msg: You can reveal someone's side with /expose [name] (you won't be revealed).
expose.exposemsg: Zelda handles the Triforce of Wisdom in her hand and reveals that ~Target~ is one of the ~Side~!

transform.msg: You can change into Sheik with /transform (this cancels any Day Protection you may have received).
transform.revealmsg: Zelda vanishes in thin air, and in her place, Sheik appears!

roles.startupmsg: You are ~Role~, the princess of Hyrule!
roles.help: You can expose someone's side during the day with /expose [name] (you won't be revealed). Your vote counts as +3 and you have a 50% chance of evading daykills. You can also use /transform during the day to change into Sheik.

expose.msg: You can reveal someone's side with /expose [name] (you won't be revealed).
expose.exposemsg: Zelda handles the Triforce of Wisdom in her hand and reveals that ~Target~ is one of the ~Side~!

transform.msg: You can change into Sheik with /transform (this cancels any Day Protection you may have received).
transform.revealmsg: Zelda vanishes in thin air, and in her place, Sheik appears!

roles.startupmsg: You are ~Role~, a sheikah persona used by Zelda!
roles.help: You can find someone's role during the day with /expose [name] (you won't be revealed). You also have a voteshield of -5 and a 50% chance of evading nightkills. You can also use /transform during the day to change into Zelda.
roles.info: Can inspect during the day (not revealed). 50% chance of evading nightkills. Voteshield of -5. Can transform into Zelda during the day. ~Sided~

expose.msg: You can find someone's role with /expose [name] (you won't be revealed).
expose.exposemsg: Using an ancient sheikah relic, Sheik was able to identify ~Role~'s identity!

transform.msg: You can change into Zelda with /transform (this cancels any Day Protection you may have received).
transform.revealmsg: Sheik vanishes in thin air, and in their place, Zelda appears!

roles.startupmsg: You are ~Role~, a sheikah persona used by Zelda!
roles.help: You can find someone's role during the day with /expose [name] (you won't be revealed). You also have a voteshield of -5 and a 50% chance of evading nightkills. You can also use /transform during the day to change into Zelda.

expose.msg: You can find someone's role with /expose [name] (you won't be revealed).
expose.exposemsg: Using an ancient sheikah relic, Sheik was able to identify ~Role~'s identity!

transform.msg: You can change into Zelda with /transform (this cancels any Day Protection you may have received).
transform.revealmsg: Sheik vanishes in thin air, and in their place, Zelda appears!

roles.startupmsg: You are ~Role~, the Great King of Evil!
roles.help: You can kill a player during the day with /kill [name] (you won't be revealed). You are immune to nightkills.
roles.info: Can daykill (not revealed). Immune to kill. ~Sided~

kill.msg: You can kill now with /kill [name], and that will not reveal you!
kill.killmsg: With the Triforce of Power on his hand, Ganondorf hits ~Target~ with a devastating Warlock Punch!

roles.startupmsg: You are ~Role~, the Great King of Evil!
roles.help: You can kill a player during the day with /kill [name] (you won't be revealed). You are immune to nightkills.

kill.msg: You can kill now with /kill [name], and that will not reveal you!
kill.killmsg: With the Triforce of Power on his hand, Ganondorf hits ~Target~ with a devastating Warlock Punch!

roles.help: DONTDO

roles.startupmsg: You are ~Role~, the cartoon-styled Hero of Time!
roles.help: You can use /protect [name] at night to make a teammate immune to day actions for one turn. You can also use /shield [name] to receive any action directed at your target. You have a 50% chance of evading poison.
roles.info: Can protect a teammate from standby actions. Can shield. Has a 50% chance of evading poison. If all teammates die, can kill during the night. ~Sided~

shield.shieldmsg: Your ~Action~ was shielded by Toon Link!

roles.startupmsg: You are ~Role~, the cartoon-styled Hero of Time!
roles.help: You can use /protect [name] at night to make a teammate immune to day actions for one turn. You can also use /shield [name] to receive any action directed at your target. You have a 50% chance of evading poison.

shield.shieldmsg: Your ~Action~ was shielded by Toon Link!

roles.startupmsg: You are ~Role~, the cartoon-styled Hero of Time!
roles.help: You can kill one player at night with /kill [name]. You have a 50% chance of evading poison.

roles.startupmsg: You are ~Role~, the Hero of Time before obtaining the Master Sword!
roles.help: You can use /protect [name] at night to make a teammate immune to day actions for one turn. You can also use /shield [name] to receive any action directed at your target. You have a 50% chance of evading daykills.
roles.info: Can protect a teammate from standby actions. Can shield. Has a 50% chance of evading daykills. If all teammates die, can kill during the night. ~Sided~

shield.shieldmsg: Your ~Action~ was shielded by Young Link!

roles.startupmsg: You are ~Role~, the Hero of Time before obtaining the Master Sword!
roles.help: You can use /protect [name] at night to make a teammate immune to day actions for one turn. You can also use /shield [name] to receive any action directed at your target. You have a 50% chance of evading daykills.

shield.shieldmsg: Your ~Action~ was shielded by Young Link!

roles.startupmsg: You are ~Role~, the Hero of Time before obtaining the Master Sword!
roles.help: You can kill one player at night with /kill [name]. You have a 50% chance of evading daykills.

roles.startupmsg: You have been kidnapped!
roles.help: You are unable to use any action and even your vote counts as 0 now, but you will return to your normal role after 1 turn.
DONTDO

roles.startupmsg: You are ~Role~, the general of Etruria and next heir to Pherae!
roles.help: You can kill a player at night with /kill [name] (shared with your team). You survive 1 lynch per game and will automatically kill the first person to vote for you when that happens.
roles.info: Can kill (shared). Survives 1 lynch and kills first person to vote him. ~Sided~

killVoters.message: 'I won't go down so easily!' - says Roy, as he strikes ~Target~ with a strong sword slash!

lynch.convertmsg: Meanwhile, the Binding Blade heals Roy's injuries, allowing him to survive the lynch!

roles.startupmsg: You are ~Role~, the general of Etruria and next heir to Pherae!
roles.help: You can kill a player at night with /kill [name] (shared with your team). You already escaped a lynch once, so that will not happen again.

roles.startupmsg: You are ~Role~, the King of Altea!
roles.help: You can kill a player at night with /kill [name] (shared with your team). You can also kill a player during the day with /kill [name], but that will reveal you. If someone kills you during the night, you will take them down with you.
roles.info: Can kill (shared). Can daykill (revealed). Revenges nightkills. ~Sided~

kill.msg: You can use /kill [name] to defeat another player, but that will reveal you!
kill.killmsg: ~Self~ (Marth) draws his Falchion and executes a perfect combo of Dancing Blades upon ~Target~!

kill.msg: You attacked Marth, but he used Counter and took you down with him!

roles.startupmsg: You are ~Role~, the Princess of Ylisse!
roles.help: You can kill a player at night with /kill [name] (shared with your team). You can also kill a player during the day with /kill [name], but that will reveal you. If someone kills you during the night, you will take them down with you.

kill.msg: You can use /kill [name] to defeat another player, but that will reveal you!
kill.killmsg: ~Self~ (Lucina) pulls out the Parallel Falchion and jumps in the air to hit ~Target~ with a Dolphin Slash!

kill.msg: You attacked Lucina, but she used Counter and took you down with her!

roles.startupmsg: You are ~Role~, a member of the Greil Mercenaries!
roles.help: You can kill a player at night with /kill [name] (shared with your team). In addition to that, anyone who tries to kill you during the day will get killed instead.
roles.info: Can kill (shared). Counter daykills. ~Sided~

actions.daykillrevengemsg: ~Target~ tried to attack Ike, but Ike used Counter and beat them instead!

roles.startupmsg: You are ~Role~, a master tactician who fought alongside Chrom of Ylisse!
roles.help: You can kill a player at night with /kill [name] (shared with your team). If anyone poison, distract or inspect you, they will get killed instead.
roles.info: Can kill (shared). Kills poisoners, inspectors and distractors. ~Sided~

inspect.msg: You tried to inspect Robin, but got hit by his Thunder instead!

poison.msg: ~Target~ tried to poison you, but you killed them instead!
poison.targetmsg: You tried to poison Robin, but got hit by his Nosferatu instead!

distract.msg: You tried to distract Robin, but got hit by his Arcfire instead!

roles.startupmsg: You have been kidnapped!
roles.help: You are unable to use any action and even your vote counts as 0 now, but you will return to your normal role after 1 turn.
DONTDO

roles.startupmsg: You are ~Role~, the yellow hero who eats pellets and ghosts!
roles.help: You don't know your teammates, but you still share a poison with them (use /poison [name]). Additionally, your vote counts as +5.
roles.info: Can poison (shared). Vote counts as +5. Doesn't know teammates. ~Sided~

poison.broadcastmsg: Your partner has decided to poison ~Target~!

roles.startupmsg: You are ~Role~, the coolest, blue-est hedgehog alive!
roles.help: You don't know your teammates, but you still share a poison with them (use /poison [name]). You also have a 75% chance of evading night and daykills.
roles.info: Can poison (shared). 75% chance of evading kills and daykills. Doesn't know teammates. ~Sided~

poison.broadcastmsg: Your partner has decided to poison ~Target~!

roles.startupmsg: You are ~Role~, a former member of FOXHOUND!
roles.help: You don't know your teammates, but you still share a poison with them (use /poison [name]). You can also use /spy [name] twice per night to find someone's role and who they visited.
roles.info: Can poison (shared). Can inspect (which also stalks) twice per night. Doesn't know teammates. ~Sided~

poison.broadcastmsg: Your partner has decided to poison ~Target~!

roles.startupmsg: You are ~Role~, the blue robot created by Dr. Thomas Light!
roles.help: You don't know your teammates, but you still share a poison with them (use /poison [name]). You can also kill one person during the day with /kill [name] (you won't be revealed).
roles.info: Can poison (shared). Can daykill (not revealed). Doesn't know teammates. ~Sided~

poison.broadcastmsg: Your partner has decided to poison ~Target~!

kill.msg: You can use /kill [name] to defeat another player, and you won't be revealed!
kill.killmsg: Mega Man shoots a fully charged Mega Buster at ~Target~!

roles.startupmsg: You are ~Role~, the karate Street Fighter!
roles.help: You don't know your teammates, but you still share a poison with them (use /poison [name]). You can also kill one person during the night with /kill [name], and this will bypass any protection.
roles.info: Can poison (shared). Can kill (pierces protections). Doesn't know teammates. ~Sided~

poison.broadcastmsg: Your partner has decided to poison ~Target~!

roles.startupmsg: You have been kidnapped!
roles.help: You are unable to use any action and even your vote counts as 0 now, but you will return to your normal role after 1 turn.
DONTDO

roles.startupmsg: You are ~Role~, also known as Robotic Operating Buddy!
roles.help: You can kill a player at night with /kill [name] (shared with your team). You get more abilities as your teammates die.
roles.info: Can kill (shared). If a teammate dies, gains a distract. If 2 teammates die, gains double distract which also inspects. ~Sided~

roles.startupmsg: You are ~Role~, also known as Robotic Operating Buddy!
roles.help: You can kill a player at night with /kill [name] (shared with your team). You can use /distract [name] to stop someone's actions for the night.

roles.startupmsg: You are ~Role~, also known as Robotic Operating Buddy!
roles.help: You can kill a player at night with /kill [name] (shared with your team). You can use /distract [name] twice per night to stop someone's actions and find their role.

roles.startupmsg: You are ~Role~, the trainer who whips people into shape in Wii Fit!
roles.help: You can kill a player at night with /kill [name] (shared with your team). You get more abilities as your teammates die.
roles.info: Can kill (shared). If a teammate dies, gains a 50% chance of evading kills. If 2 teammates die, gains 75% chance of evading kills and 50% chance of evading daykills. ~Sided~

roles.startupmsg: You are ~Role~, the trainer who whips people into shape in Wii Fit!
roles.help: You can kill a player at night with /kill [name] (shared with your team). You have a 50% chance of evading kills.

roles.startupmsg: You are ~Role~, the trainer who whips people into shape in Wii Fit!
roles.help: You can kill a player at night with /kill [name] (shared with your team). You have a 75% chance of evading kills and 50% chance of evading daykills.

roles.startupmsg: You are ~Role~, a customizable avatar used in Nintendo consoles!
roles.help: You can kill a player at night with /kill [name] (shared with your team). You get more abilities as your teammates die.
roles.infoName: Mii Brawler / Mii Gunner / Mii Swordfighter
roles.info: Can kill (shared). If a teammate dies, gains a 2nd kill. If 2 teammates die, 2nd kill becomes a daykill (not revealed). ~Sided~

roles.startupmsg: You are ~Role~, a customizable avatar used in Nintendo consoles!
roles.help: You can kill a player at night with /kill [name] (shared with your team). You can also use /kill2 [name] to defeat a 2nd target at night.

roles.startupmsg: You are ~Role~, a customizable avatar used in Nintendo consoles!
roles.help: You can kill a player at night with /kill [name] (shared with your team). You no longer can use kill2, but you now can use /kill [name] during the day to defeat another player without revealing yourself.

kill.msg: You can use /kill [name] to defeat another player (you won't be revealed).
kill.killmsg: Hey look, it's a Mii. And it's holding a sword. And it just sliced ~Target~ with it!

roles.startupmsg: You are ~Role~, a resident of the Flat Zone!
roles.help: You can kill a player at night with /kill [name] (shared with your team). You get more abilities as your teammates die.
roles.info: Can kill (shared). If a teammate dies, vote counts as 2. If 2 teammates die, vote counts 2 and doubles the vote total. ~Sided~

roles.startupmsg: You are ~Role~, a resident of the Flat Zone!
roles.help: You can kill a player at night with /kill [name] (shared with your team). Your vote counts as +2.

roles.startupmsg: You are ~Role~, a resident of the Flat Zone!
roles.help: You can kill a player at night with /kill [name] (shared with your team). Your vote counts as +2, and you double the votes received by the person you vote on.

roles.startupmsg: You have been kidnapped!
roles.help: You are unable to use any action and even your vote counts as 0 now, but you will return to your normal role after 1 turn.

roles.startupmsg: You are ~Role~, the adorable plush resident of Dream Land!
roles.help: You can use /kill [name] during the night to defeat an opponent. You can also use /swallow [name] to gain a secondary ability (depending on your target's role). You also have a 50% chance of evading poison.
roles.info: Can kill. Can swallow enemy for a chance to gain a secondary ability (distract, protect, poison or inspect) that has 50% chance of working. Has a 50% chance of evading poison. ~Sided~

swallow.copymsg: Kirby has swallowed ~Target~ and obtained a new ability!

roles.help: DONTO
DONTO
DONTO
DONTO

roles.startupmsg: You are ~Role~ (Distract), the adorable plush resident of Dream Land!
roles.help: You can use /kill [name] during the night to defeat an opponent, and /distract [name] to stop their actions for the night (50% chance of success). You can change your secondary ability by using /swallow [name]. You also have a 50% chance of evading poison.

swallow.copymsg: Kirby has swallowed ~Target~ and obtained a new ability!

roles.startupmsg: You are ~Role~ (Protect), the adorable plush resident of Dream Land!
roles.help: You can use /kill [name] during the night to defeat an opponent, and /protect [name] to protect a teammate from nightkills (50% chance of success). You can change your secondary ability by using /swallow [name]. You also have a 50% chance of evading poison.

swallow.copymsg: Kirby has swallowed ~Target~ and obtained a new ability!

roles.startupmsg: You are ~Role~ (Poison), the adorable plush resident of Dream Land!
roles.help: You can use /kill [name] during the night to defeat an opponent, and /poison [name] to defeat an opponent on the next night (50% chance of success). You can change your secondary ability by using /swallow [name]. You also have a 50% chance of evading poison.

swallow.copymsg: Kirby has swallowed ~Target~ and obtained a new ability!

roles.startupmsg: You are ~Role~ (Inspect), the adorable plush resident of Dream Land!
roles.help: You can use /kill [name] during the night to defeat an opponent, and /inspect [name] to find someone's role (50% chance of success). You can change your secondary ability by using /swallow [name]. You also have a 50% chance of evading poison.

swallow.copymsg: Kirby has swallowed ~Target~ and obtained a new ability!

roles.startupmsg: You are ~Role~, the honorable and mysterious captain of the Halberd!
roles.help: You can use /kill [name] during the day to defeat an opponent without revealing yourself. You can also use /slice [name] during the day to kill a 2nd target, but this one will have a 50% chance of revealing you. You have a 50% chance of evading nightkills.
roles.info: Can daykill (not revealed). Has a 2nd Daykill with a 50% chance of revealing. Has a 50% chance of evading kills. ~Sided~

kill.msg: You can use /kill [name] to defeat another player (this won't reveal you)!
kill.killmsg: Meta Knight pulls out the holy sword, Galaxia, and strikes it through ~Target~'s chest!

slice.msg: You can also use /slice [name] to defeat a 2nd player, but this one will have a 50% chance of revealing you!
slice.killmsg: Meta Knight flips his Dimensional Cape, plunging the world into darkness, and then hits ~Target~ with a powerful sword strike!
slice.revealmsg: Meta Knight's mask falls for a split second, and he can be identified as ~Self~!

roles.startupmsg: You are ~Role~, the self-claimed king of Dream Land!
roles.help: Your vote counts randomly as 0, 1, 2, 3, 5, 10, 100 or 1000 (can be different every turn). You have a 50% chance of evading daykills.
roles.info: Vote counts randomly as 0, 1, 2, 3, 5, 10, 100 or 1000. Has a 50% chance of evading daykills. ~Sided~

roles.startupmsg: You have been kidnapped!
roles.help: You are unable to use any action and even your vote counts as 0 now, but you will return to your normal role after 1 turn.
DONTDO

roles.startupmsg: You are ~Role~, the leader of Star Fox!
roles.help: You can kill a player at night with /kill [name] (shared with your team). You can also use /kill [name] during the day to defeat an opponent, but that will have a 25% chance of revealing you.
roles.info: Can kill (shared). Can daykill (25% chance of revealing). ~Sided~

kill.msg: You can use /kill [name] to defeat another player (there's a 25% chance you will be revealed)!
kill.killmsg: Fox's Arwing comes down to the stage and shoots a laser on ~Target~!
kill.revealmsg: 'Mission Clear!' - says ~Self~ (Fox) in the Arwing's communication system.

roles.startupmsg: You are ~Role~, a member of Star Fox!
roles.help: You can kill a player at night with /kill [name] (shared with your team). You can also use /inspect [name] during the DAY to find someone's role (you will not be revealed, and only you will see that person's role).
roles.info: Can kill (shared). Can day-Inspect (not revealed). ~Sided~

inspect.msg: You can use /expose [name] now to find someone's role (this won't reveal you, and only you will see the inspection's result)!
inspect.exposemsg: 'Falco Lombardi reporting. I have confirmed ~Target~'s identity!'

roles.startupmsg: You are ~Role~, the leader of the Star Wolf!
roles.help: You can kill a player at night with /kill [name] (shared with your team). During the day, you can /copy [name] another player to get twice their vote power for one turn.
roles.info: Can kill (shared). During the day, can copy someone's vote as twice its value for one turn.. ~Sided~

roles.startupmsg: You are ~Role~, the leader of the Star Wolf!
roles.help: You can kill a player at night with /kill [name] (shared with your team). During the day, you can /copy [name] another player to get twice their vote power for one turn.
roles.help2: Your vote counts as 0 for this turn!

roles.startupmsg: You are ~Role~, the leader of the Star Wolf!
roles.help: You can kill a player at night with /kill [name] (shared with your team). During the day, you can /copy [name] another player to get twice their vote power for one turn.
roles.help2: Your vote counts as +2 for this turn!

roles.startupmsg: You are ~Role~, the leader of the Star Wolf!
roles.help: You can kill a player at night with /kill [name] (shared with your team). During the day, you can /copy [name] another player to get twice their vote power for one turn.
roles.help2: Your vote counts as +4 for this turn!

roles.startupmsg: You are ~Role~, the leader of the Star Wolf!
roles.help: You can kill a player at night with /kill [name] (shared with your team). During the day, you can /copy [name] another player to get twice their vote power for one turn.
roles.help2: Your vote counts as +6 for this turn!

roles.startupmsg: You are ~Role~, the leader of the Star Wolf!
roles.help: You can kill a player at night with /kill [name] (shared with your team). During the day, you can /copy [name] another player to get twice their vote power for one turn.
roles.help2: Your vote counts as +10 for this turn!

roles.startupmsg: You are ~Role~, the leader of the Star Wolf!
roles.help: You can kill a player at night with /kill [name] (shared with your team). During the day, you can /copy [name] another player to get twice their vote power for one turn.
roles.help2: Your vote counts as +12 for this turn!

roles.startupmsg: You are ~Role~, the leader of the Star Wolf!
roles.help: You can kill a player at night with /kill [name] (shared with your team). During the day, you can /copy [name] another player to get twice their vote power for one turn.
roles.help2: Your vote counts as +200 for this turn!

roles.startupmsg: You are ~Role~, the leader of the Star Wolf!
roles.help: You can kill a player at night with /kill [name] (shared with your team). During the day, you can /copy [name] another player to get twice their vote power for one turn.
roles.help2: Your vote counts as -10 for this turn!

roles.startupmsg: You are ~Role~, the leader of the Star Wolf!
roles.help: You can kill a player at night with /kill [name] (shared with your team). During the day, you can /copy [name] another player to get twice their vote power for one turn.
roles.help2: Your vote counts randomly as 0, 2, 4, 6, 10, 20, 200 or 2000 for this turn!

roles.startupmsg: You have been kidnapped!
roles.help: You are unable to use any action and even your vote counts as 0 now, but you will return to your normal role after 1 turn.

roles.startupmsg: You are ~Role~, winged soldier of the Goddess Palutena!
roles.help: You can use /protect [name] to protect someone from nightkills. Your vote counts as +5.
roles.info: Can Protect. Vote counts as +5. ~Sided~

roles.startupmsg: You are ~Role~, the Goddess of Light from Angel Land!
roles.help: Your vote vounts as +100. You can also use /safeguard [name] to protect someone (even yourself) from poison, distract and other non-killing actions.
roles.info: Can Safeguard (even itself). Vote counts as +100. ~Sided~

roles.startupmsg: You are ~Role~, a mysterious, black-clad doppelgänger of Pit!
roles.help: You can use /kill [name] at night to defeat an opponent. Your vote counts as -5.
roles.info: Can kill. Vote counts as -5. ~Sided~

roles.startupmsg: You have been kidnapped!
roles.help: You are unable to use any action and even your vote counts as 0 now, but you will return to your normal role after 1 turn.
DONTDO

roles.startupmsg: You are ~Role~, the ape king of the jungle!
roles.help: You can use /kill [name] twice per night to defeat another player (shared with your team). You cannot be distracted, stalked or watched, and while you are alive, your kills will bypass any protection.
roles.info: Can kill twice per night (shared). Pierces protection. Cannot be distracted, stalked or watched. ~Sided~

distract.msg: The ~User~ tried to distract you, but they cannot stop someone as big as you!

roles.startupmsg: You are ~Role~, Donkey Kong's little buddy!
roles.help: You can use /kill [name] twice per night to defeat another player (shared with your team). You can also use /protect [name] to protect someone from nightkills.
roles.info: Can kill twice per night (shared). Can protect. ~Sided~

roles.startupmsg: You have been kidnapped!
roles.help: You are unable to use any action and even your vote counts as 0 now, but you will return to your normal role after 1 turn.
DONTDO

roles.startupmsg: You are ~Role~, a PSI extrodinaire from Eagleland!
roles.help: You can use /poison [name] twice per night to defeat another player during the next turn (shared with your team). You can also use /flash [name] to find someone's role, who they visited and who visited them during the night. Lastly, you also survive 1 nightkill and 1 daykill per game.
roles.info: Can poison twice per night (shared). Can flash (inspect + watch + stalk). Survives 1 kill and 1 daykill. ~Sided~

roles.startupmsg: You are ~Role~, a PSI extrodinaire from Eagleland!
roles.help: You can use /poison [name] twice per night to defeat another player during the next turn (shared with your team). You can also use /flash [name] to find someone's role, who they visited and who visited them during the night. Lastly, you also survive 1 nightkill and 1 daykill per game.

roles.startupmsg: You are ~Role~, a young PSI user from Nowhere Islands!
roles.help: You can use /poison [name] twice per night to defeat another player during the next turn (shared with your team). You can also use /freeze [name] to distract and poison a target (they will die after 2 turns). Lastly, you get hax on kills and nightkills.
roles.info: Can poison twice per night (shared). Can freeze (distract + piercing poison that kills after 2 turns). Hax on kills and daykills. ~Sided~

roles.startupmsg: You have been kidnapped!
roles.help: You are unable to use any action and even your vote counts as 0 now, but you will return to your normal role after 1 turn.

roles.startupmsg: You are ~Role~, a duo of a goofy dog and a duck!
roles.help: You can use /expose [name] during the day to reveal someone's side (you won't be revealed). Alternatively, you can reveal someone as a fake side with /mario (exposes as Mario Team), /poke, /zelda, /fe (Fire Emblem), /third, /system, /kirby, /fox, /ki (Kid Icarus), /dk (Donkey Kong), /eb (Earthbound) or /duck (Duck Hunt). You evade 1 nightkill, 1 daykill and 1 poison per game and you win with any side as long as you survive, but you can't just claim because you have a voteshield of +5
roles.info: Can expose side or fake-expose side, with a chance of revealing if it was true or fake. Evades 1 kill, 1 daykill and 1 poison per game. Voteshield of +5. Wins with everyone.

expose.msg: You can expose someone's side by typing /expose [name] (You won't be revealed!):
expose.exposemsg: A dog jumps into the tall grass. After a few seconds, they come back laughing and saying that '~Target~ is the one of the ~Side~!'
expose.revealmsg: Still laughing, the dog is probably thinking 'That's completely true'.

mario.msg: You can instead expose that person as a fake side by using /mario, /poke, /zelda, /fe (Fire Emblem), /third, /system, /kirby, /fox, /ki (Kid Icarus), /dk (Donkey Kong), /eb (Earthbound) or /duck (Duck Hunt):
mario.exposemsg: A dog jumps into the tall grass. After a few seconds, they come back laughing and saying that '~Target~ is the one of the Mario Team!'
mario.revealmsg: Still laughing, the dog is probably thinking 'That's actually a lie, let's see if anyone believes it'.

poke.exposemsg: A dog jumps into the tall grass. After a few seconds, they come back laughing and saying that '~Target~ is the one of the Pokémon Team!'
poke.revealmsg: Still laughing, the dog is probably thinking 'That's actually a lie, let's see if anyone believes it'.

zelda.exposemsg: A dog jumps into the tall grass. After a few seconds, they come back laughing and saying that '~Target~ is the one of the Zelda Team!'
zelda.revealmsg: Still laughing, the dog is probably thinking 'That's actually a lie, let's see if anyone believes it'.

fe.exposemsg: A dog jumps into the tall grass. After a few seconds, they come back laughing and saying that '~Target~ is the one of the Fire Emblem Team!'
fe.revealmsg: Still laughing, the dog is probably thinking 'That's actually a lie, let's see if anyone believes it'.

third.exposemsg: A dog jumps into the tall grass. After a few seconds, they come back laughing and saying that '~Target~ is the one of the Third Party characters!'
third.revealmsg: Still laughing, the dog is probably thinking 'That's actually a lie, let's see if anyone believes it'.

system.exposemsg: A dog jumps into the tall grass. After a few seconds, they come back laughing and saying that '~Target~ is the one of the System Characters!'
system.revealmsg: Still laughing, the dog is probably thinking 'That's actually a lie, let's see if anyone believes it'.

kirby.exposemsg: A dog jumps into the tall grass. After a few seconds, they come back laughing and saying that '~Target~ is the one of the Kirby Team!'
kirby.revealmsg: Still laughing, the dog is probably thinking 'That's actually a lie, let's see if anyone believes it'.

fox.exposemsg: A dog jumps into the tall grass. After a few seconds, they come back laughing and saying that '~Target~ is the one of the Star Fox Team!'
fox.revealmsg: Still laughing, the dog is probably thinking 'That's actually a lie, let's see if anyone believes it'.

ki.exposemsg: A dog jumps into the tall grass. After a few seconds, they come back laughing and saying that '~Target~ is the one of the Kid Icarus Team!'
ki.revealmsg: Still laughing, the dog is probably thinking 'That's actually a lie, let's see if anyone believes it'.

dk.exposemsg: A dog jumps into the tall grass. After a few seconds, they come back laughing and saying that '~Target~ is the one of the Donkey Kong Team!'
dk.revealmsg: Still laughing, the dog is probably thinking 'That's actually a lie, let's see if anyone believes it'.

eb.exposemsg: A dog jumps into the tall grass. After a few seconds, they come back laughing and saying that '~Target~ is the one of the Earthbound Team!'
eb.revealmsg: Still laughing, the dog is probably thinking 'That's actually a lie, let's see if anyone believes it'.

duck.exposemsg: A dog jumps into the tall grass. After a few seconds, they come back laughing and saying that '~Target~ is the one of the Duck Hunt!'
duck.revealmsg: Still laughing, the dog is probably thinking 'That's actually a lie, let's see if anyone believes it'.

roles.startupmsg: You are ~Role~, an energetic young man from a peaceful town in Animal Crossing!
roles.help: You can use /pocket [name] to change someone's role into another one from their same team. You can also use /inspect [name] to find someone's role, and your vote counts as +6.
roles.info: Can convert target into another role from the same team. Can inspect. Vote counts as +6. ~Sided~

pocket.convertmsg: Villager (somehow) puts ~Old~ in his pocket, and then releases it back as ~New~!

roles.startupmsg: You are ~Role~, an energetic young man from a peaceful town in Animal Crossing!
roles.help: You can use /pocket [name] to change someone's role into another one from their same team. You win with anyone as long as you survive.
roles.info: Can convert target into another role from the same team. Wins with everyone as long as it survives.

pocket.convertmsg: Villager (somehow) puts ~Old~ in his pocket, and then releases it back as ~New~!

roles.startupmsg: You are ~Role~, which is actually a duo, Popo and Nana!
roles.help: You can poison any number of players you want with /poison [name], and they will die after 4 turns. You can also use /distract [name] to stop someone's action for the night. Your vote counts as +2, and you evade 1 nightkill per game.
roles.info: Can poison any number of players (poison kills after 4 turns). Can distract. Vote counts as +2. Evades 1 nightkill. ~Sided~

roles.startupmsg: You are ~Role~, the bounty hunter!
roles.help: You can kill two targets per night with /kill [name]. You cannot be distracted or daykilled, and you can change into Zero Suit Samus by using /change.
roles.info: Can kill twice per turn. Evades daykills. Cannot be distracted. Can change into Zero Suit Samus. ~Sided~

change.convertmsg: Samus took her Power Suit off!

distract.msg: ~User~ tried to distract you, but you are an experienced bounty hunter and won't stop that easily!

roles.startupmsg: You are ~Role~, the bounty hunter without her Power Suit!
roles.help: You can kill on person at night with /kill [name], and distract someone with /distract [name]. Your vote counts as +2, you cannot be distracted or nightkilled, and you can change into Samus by using /change.
roles.info: Can kill. Can distract. Vote counts as +2. Evades nightkills. Cannot be distracted. Can change into Samus. ~Sided~

change.convertmsg: Samus put her Power Suit back on!

distract.msg: ~User~ tried to distract you, but you are an experienced bounty hunter and won't stop that easily!

roles.startupmsg: You are ~Role~, the little boxer from Punch-Out!!
roles.help: You can kill during the night with /kill [name], and that will bypass protections. For every 2 kills in a row, you also can use /kill [name] during the day once. You also counter any daykill.

kill.msg: You can use /kill [name] to defeat another player (this won't reveal you)!
kill.killmsg: Little Mac hits ~Target~ with a KO Uppercut! It's an One-Hit KO!

actions.daykillrevengemsg: As ~Target~ tries to attack Little Mac, their attack is evaded and a Slip Counter hits them instead!

roles.startupmsg: You are ~Role~, the little boxer from Punch-Out!!
roles.help: You can kill during the night with /kill [name], and that will bypass protections. For every 2 kills in a row, you also can use /kill [name] during the day once. You also counter any daykill.

kill.dummyusermsg: You got enough hits in a row! You can daykill once now with /kill [name]!

kill.msg: You can use /kill [name] to defeat another player (this won't reveal you)!
kill.killmsg: Little Mac hits ~Target~ with a KO Uppercut! It's an One-Hit KO!

actions.daykillrevengemsg: As ~Target~ tries to attack Little Mac, their attack is evaded and a Slip Counter hits them instead!

roles.info: Can kill (bypass protection). Gains 1 daykill for every 2 nightkills in a row. Counter daykills. ~Sided~

roles.startupmsg: You are ~Role~, a famous F-Zero Racer!
roles.help: You can use /kill [name] during the day to kill another player without revealing yourself. Twice during the game, you can also use /kill [name] during the night. You have a voteshield of -3.
roles.info: Can daykill (not revealed). Can kill (2 charges). Voteshield of -3. ~Sided~

kill.msg: You can use /kill [name] to defeat another player (you won't be revealed)!

roles.startupmsg: You are ~Role~, an employee of the Hocotate Freights!
roles.help: You can use /pluck [name] during the night to transform someone into a Pikmin, which wins both with you and with their former team.
roles.info: Can pluck (turns target into a Pikmin which wins both with Olimar and with their former team). ~Sided~

pluck.convertmsg: Olimar plucks ~Old~ and turns them into a ~New~!
pluck.usermsg: You have plucked ~Target~ (~Old~) and made them into a Pikmin!

roles.startupmsg: You are now a ~Role~!
roles.help: You lost all of your previous abilities and have joined Olimar's team, but you still win with your former team too.
roles.info: Sided with Pikmin Team, but still wins with former team too.

roles.startupmsg: You are now a ~Role~!
roles.help: You lost all of your previous abilities and have joined Olimar's team, but you still win with your former team too.

roles.startupmsg: You are ~Role~, a very methodical youth able to wield the Monado!
roles.help: You can use /kill [name] during the night to defeat another player. You can also use the Monado Arts to protect and safeguard yourself (with /shield), to poison another player (with /poison) or to increase your vote count to +3 for one turn (with /buster). You can only use one Monado Art per turn, and each of them can only be used twice per game.

buster.cursemsg: During this turn, your vote will count as +3!

roles.startupmsg: You are ~Role~, a very methodical youth able to wield the Monado!
roles.help: You can use /kill [name] during the night to defeat another player. You can also use the Monado Arts to protect and safeguard yourself (with /shield), to poison another player (with /poison) or to increase your vote count to +3 for one turn (with /buster). You can only use one Monado Art per turn, and each of them can only be used twice per game.
roles.info: Can kill. Can use any following actions twice per game (but only one per night): shield (protect + safeguard itself), poison or buster (vote counts as +3 for one turn). ~Sided~

buster.cursemsg: During this turn, your vote will count as +3!

roles.startupmsg: You are ~Role~, a very methodical youth able to wield the Monado!
roles.help: You can use /kill [name] during the night to defeat another player. You can also use the Monado Arts to protect and safeguard yourself (with /shield), to poison another player (with /poison) or to increase your vote count to +3 for one turn (with /buster). You can only use one Monado Art per turn, and each of them can only be used twice per game.

buster.cursemsg: During this turn, your vote will count as +3!

killmsg: ±Announcer: ~Player~ (~Role~) has been thrown off of the screen!
killusermsg: *** You have been thrown off the screen!
lynchmsg: ±Announcer: ~Player~ (~Role~) was knocked out of the stage with ~Count~% damage!

tips.Teams: There's no village in this theme. You can think of it as a Mafia vs. Mafia game.
tips.Pikmin: Remember that a player turned into Pikmin still wins with their former side, so don't need to kill a former teammate if that happens.

changelog.24.06.2015: Ryu added to Third Party characters as a low priority nightkiller that bypass protections (in addition to shared poison). Luigi can now inspect to find if a player can daykill, nightkill, poison or neither. Pikachu/Pichu now have a recharge of 1 turn after using /kill. Ice Climbers' poison now kill in 4 turns. Duck Hunt evades 1 nightkill, 1 daykill and 1 poison. Pikmins can /shield once per game. Toon/Young Link can dayprotect (protect teammate from daykills and exposes), but can only kill if they are the last member alive of the team. Zelda now expose side instead of role and has a 50% chance of evading daykills. Sheik dayinspects instead of exposing. Zelda and Sheik can /transform into the other during the day. Zero Suit Samus' vote is now +2. Wolf can now copy someone's vote as twice their value for 1 turn.
changelog.01.06.2015: Slightly increased Luigi and Dr. Mario's hax. Added recharge of 3 turns to Dr. Mario's /cure. Sheik now has a 50% chance of evading nightkills. Reduced Captain Falcon's voteshield from -4 to -3. Fire Emblem's kill is now faster than Mario team
changelog.26.05.2015: Duck Hunt now has a voteshield of +5.
